title: Diabetes and Heart Disease Prediction System
description: Developed a robust machine learning (ML) model to predict diabetes and heart disease using patient medical records üìä. Dataset includes age, gender, blood pressure, BMI, and glucose levels. After testing several ML algorithms, Random Forest outperformed others, achieving over 90% accuracy üéØ. This project highlights ML's potential in early disease detection, helping healthcare providers identify high-risk patients and implement preventive measures. Future work will refine these models and explore additional features to improve prediction accuracy.

title: Real Estate Website (Nestify) üè†
description: This Real Estate Website aims to develop a dynamic and user-friendly online platform using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack, JWT authentication and redux toolkit. This platform facilitate seamless interactions between property buyers, sellers, and renters, offering a comprehensive suite of features including property listings, advanced search functionality, price prediction of the listing, user authentication, and interactive property viewing experiences.

title: Hand Gesture Recognition for Gaming üéÆ‚úã
description: Developed a hand gesture recognition system for gaming using OpenCV and TensorFlow. This project captures and classifies hand movements to interact with game functions in real-time. For example, in a game like Temple Run, gestures can control actions such as jumping or moving right/left or sliding. The system detects hand gestures from live video feeds, processes the images, and accurately recognizes the gestures to enhance the gaming experience.
